Hi Adrian,
 

Can you please provide an update on this ticket.

 

We are also receiving tickets from users where the websites that were working till last week are being blocked by EPP.

After disabling EPP the website starts working fine.

I’m creating another ticket for the same, this is just an FYI as it is similar to this scenario.
Likewise, there are no block logs in the CAP portal.

 



Regards,

Dear Harshvardhan,

Unfortunately I was out of office on Monday when we were supposed to have the meeting on medical leave.
I saw your direct email, and would like to inform you that we are not allowed to reply to direct emails, but we have to keep the communication in the Support tickets for transparency, so whenever you reply to a ticket please do in in the same thread where we communicated before regarding that specific topic and by keeping the  techsupport@netwrix.com email address at Receiver.

Please let me know if the user would be available tomorrow from 3:30, 4:30 or 5:30 PM IST as this would be my first earliest timeslots available.

Best regards,

Adrian Draghici |Technical Support Team Lead (EMEA/Asia/Aus)
